Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel. Good location, great breakfast, but noisy room with poor airconditioning.”
Reviews.Author: Erasmuspilot
Reviews.Content: stayed 1 night business trip hotel nice indeed looked clean beautiful design clean spanish hotels breakfast disappointment vincci centrum hotel breakfast vast choice bread fruits meats cereals etc bring own laptop enjoy free highspeed cabled internet wifi free location 10 minutes walking plaza mayor prado instance staff professional helpful friendly quiet night sleep floor streetside traffic outside dense noisy traffic awake wake airco weather nice sunny outside temperatures rising 25c shade april bed estimate temperature 26c 21c nights sleep airco controller set cooling cold fan speed didnt blow cooled air airco broke hotel hadnt switched central airco system frankly expect airco available round spanish hotels price class conclusion hotel staff recommend due poor sleep quality noise airco april
